text: Republicans stuck it to themselves and everyone else after years of campaigning on undoing ObamaCare, justifying this idea with lies. Did any of them think one or two steps out, that someday they'd be in a position to have their bluff called? Now look at where they/we are. About to do real damage to the country. As Marge Gunderson asked in Fargo (the movie):

subs.text: "And for what? A little bit of money. There's more to life than a little money you know. Don't you know that? And here you are. And it's a beautiful day. Well. I just don't understand."
